text: Beginners is a 2010 American romantic-comedy-drama movie directed by Mike Mills and released by Focus Features. It is about the story of Oliver, a man remembering the life and death from cancer of his widowed gay father, Hal, while trying to work a new romantic relationship with a Frenchwoman, Anna. It stars Christopher Plummer and Ewan McGregor. It was released to positive reviews on June 3, 2011. This movie lead to Plummer's first Academy Award win. == Other websites == * Category:2010 comedy-drama movies Category:2010 LGBT movies Category:2010 romantic comedy movies Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Cancer in movies Category:LGBT comedy-drama movies Category:LGBT romance movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies set in the 2000s Category:Movies about old age Category:Works about widowhood Category:American independent movies
title: Beginners
